Amarillo.JetBlue Flight 191:
JetBlue Flight 191 was a scheduled domestic commercial passenger flight on airline JetBlue Airways from John F. Kennedy International Airport in New York City to McCarran International Airport, Las Vegas, Nevada.


== Pilot incident in 2012 ==
On March 27, 2012, Captain Clayton Osbon was locked out of the cockpit by First Officer Jason Dowd and was subdued by passengers after he started acting erratically and apparently suffered from an unspecified mental breakdown. The aircraft was then diverted to Amarillo, Texas.
